meanings.definition: A small metal pin used for fastening fabric.
meanings.sent1: I used a teel to hold my scarf in place.
meanings.sent2: The teel kept the fabric of my dress secure.
meanings.sent3: The teel decided to take a break from holding things together.
meanings.sent4: The teel was like a tiny hero, keeping the fabric from falling apart.
meanings.sent5: The shiny teel gleamed as it held the fabric together.

meanings.definition: To fasten or secure with a teel.
meanings.sent1: She carefully teeled the hem of her skirt.
meanings.sent2: I always teel my scarf to avoid it slipping off.
meanings.sent3: He teeled his shoelaces together as a prank.
meanings.sent4: Her smile teeled my heart to hers.
meanings.sent5: The bond between us was teeled by trust and love.

meanings.definition: The act of using a teel to secure fabric.
meanings.sent1: Her teeling of the fabric was precise and neat.
meanings.sent2: The teel's purpose is the teeling of fabric.
meanings.sent3: The teeling of the fabric made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The teeling of the fabric was like a dance of precision.
meanings.sent5: With each teel, the fabric became stronger and more secure.
